Kirehe FC vs Rayon Sports

Kirehe FC 0-4 Rayon Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:20

Rayon Sports yegukanye igikombe cya cyenda cya shampiyona

Gutsinda uyu mukino byafashije Rayon Sports kuzuza amanota 69, yegukana igikombe cya shampiyona cy’uyu mwaka w’imikino 2018/19 hakibura umunsi umwe ngo shampiyona igere ku musozo. APR FC ya kabiri n’amanota 62 ntabwo yashyikira Rayon Sports mu mikino ibiri isigaje.

17:20

Umukino urarangiye: Rayon Sports itahanye amanota y'umunsi

Rayon Sports ibashije kwikura i Kirehe, ihatsindiye ibitego 4-0 mu mukino w'umunsi wa 29 wa shampiyona.

17:18

90+1' Igitego cya kane cya Rayon Sports

Umunya-Ghana Michael Sarpong yujuje ibitego 16 muri shampiyona y'uyu mwaka nyuma yo gufata icyemezo acenga abakinnyi babiri ba Kirehe FC, areba uko umunyezamu Musoni ahagaze, amutera mu nguni ntiyabasha kugera ku mupira. 4G!

17:16

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane w'umukino yerekanye iminota itatu y'inyongera kuri uyu mukino uri guhuza Kirehe FC na Rayon Sports

17:10

84' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Myugariro w'ibumoso, Irambona Eric asimbuwe na Rutanga Eric umaze iminsi abanza ku ntebe y'abasimbura

17:08

82' Kirehe FC irarokotse

Mugisha Gilbert acenze myugariro wa Kirehe, atera ishoti rikomeye umupira ujya muri koruneri na yo itewe, ushyizweho umutwe na Michael Sarpong n'umutwe, abakinnyi ba Kirehe FC bakiza izamu.

17:06

80' Gusimbuza kwa Kirehe FC

Mutabazi Isaie yinjiye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Kirehe FC, aho asimbuye Karim Patient

17:03

76' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Iradukunda Eric Radu ukina inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo, asimbuwe na Mugisha Gilbert ukina hagati asatira izamu

17:01

74' Igitego cya gatatu cya Rayon Sports

Jules Ulimwengu atsinze igitego cye cya 19 cya shampiyona ku mupira uturutse iburyo, uhinduwe na Manzi Thierry uhise ushimirwa bikomeye na bagenzi be mu gihe uyu murundi yishimiye kuba ashobora kuyobora abatsinze byinshi uyu mwaka w'imikino

16:58

72' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Cyuzuzo Ally wa Kirehe FC, ahawe iarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Ulimwengu Jules mu kibuga hagati

16:53

66' Rayon Sports iri gukora amakosa menshi

Mukanya gato kapiteni wa Rayon Sports, Manzi Thierry yahawe ikarita y'umuhondo akiniye nabi rutahizamu wa Kirehe FC. Rayon Sports iri gukora amakosa atandukanye muri iki gice cya kabiri.

16:46

58' Gusatira kwa Kirehe FC

Mohamed Abdallah ahawe umupira mwiza na Muhoza Tresor ateye mu izamu uca ku ruhande urarenga. Iyi kipe iri ku kibuga cyayo irimo kugerageza gukina neza muri iyi minota.

16:40

53' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel ateye umupira ahana ikosa ryari rikozwe na Kirehe, umupira ujya muri koruneri yongeye guterwa n'uyu mukinnyi, bawusubizamo. Djabel ateye umupira ashaka Ulimwengu, ntiyawugeraho ujya hanze.

16:35

Mu yindi mikino

Uko ku bindi bibuga byifashe

Etincelles 0-1 Mukura VS
Gicumbi FC 2-0 AS Muhanga
Musanze FC 0-1 Bugesera FC
AS Kigali 1-1 Police FC

16:33

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Igice cya kabiri kimaze gutangira i Nyakarambi. Rayon Sports itangiye isatira ibifashijwemo na Ulimwengu na Radu, ibona koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

16:16

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:15

44' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Iradukunda Eric Radu azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, awusunika imbere usanga Michael Sarpong uteye ishoti, Musoni Theophile ashyira umupira muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

16:11

40' Igitego cya kabiri cya Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports ibonye penaliti yinjijwe neza na Michael Sarpong ku mupira wari ukozwe na Nzabonima Prosper mu rubuga rw'amahina.

16:09

36' Gusatira kwa Kirehe FC

Nyuma y'ishoti rikomeye ryari ritewe na Mugheni Fabrice, umupira ugaca hejuru y'izamu, na Kanani Abuba wa Kirehe FC agerageje irindi rikomeye, umupira uca imbere y'izamu rya Rayon Sports.

16:02

32' Rayon Sports iri gusatira cyane

Kuva ku munota wa mbere kugeza ku wa 30, Kirehe FC yateye mu izamu inshuro imwe nabwo umupira ntiwaganaga mu izamu. Rayon Sports yihariye umupira ndetse iri kugerageza gutera mu izamu inshuro zitandukanye n'ubwo akenshi iri kugorwa n'ubwugarizi bwa Kirehe FC.

Ulimwengu akinannye na Irambona utanze umupira kuri Michael Sarpong ashyizeho umutwe ufatwa na Musoni Theophile.

16:01

25' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Jules Ulimwengu afunguye amazamu ku gitego cya Rayon Sports ku mupira ateranye myugariro wa Kirehe FC, Prosper, wakuyeho umupira ubanza kumugora, aroba umunyezamu Musoni Theophile wari usohotse ajya gutabara ikipe ye. Uyu rutahizamu w'umunyarwanda ukomoka mu Burundi yujuje ibitego 18 muri shampiyona

15:52

21' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Cyuzuzo Ally akiniye nabi Manishimwe Djabel mu rubuga rwa Kirehe FC. umusifuzi Nsoro atanze coup-franc itewe na Djabel aha Mutsinzi Ange uteye umupira ukomeye uca hejuru y'izamu

15:51

19' Rayon Sports yongeye guhusha uburyo bw'igitego

Ku mupira urenguwe na Irambona, Habimana Hussein awukozeho ujya hanze mu gihe Jules Ulimwengu na Michael Sarpong na bo bananiwe gushyira umupira mu izamu ku bundi buryo bubonetse imbere y'izamu

15:47

15' Amakipe yombi yagowe n'ikibuga

Kugeza ubu umupira uri gukinwa n'abakinnyi b'inyuma gusa. Kubonana biri hasi cyane aho usanga bahererekanya umupira wagera kuri ba rutahizamu bakagorwa no gutera mu izamu

15:38

7' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Kanani Abuba arengeje umupira urenguwe na Irambona Eric mu izamu, Musoni Theophile ananirwa kuwufata, usanga Donkor Prosper uteye mu izamu, ukurwaho n'umukinnyi wa Kirehe FC.

15:36

5' Coup-franc ya Kirehe FC

Habimana Hussein akiniye nabi Mohamed Abdallah wa Kirehe mu kibuga hagati ku mupira wari uvuye ku munyezamu Musoni Theophile. Cyuzuzo Ally ateye umupira ahana ikosa, ujya mu biganza bya Mazimpaka Andre.

15:34

3' Umupira uri gukinirwa mu kirere

Michael Sarpong yari acomekewe umupira imbere, ashatse gusiga myugariro wa Kirehe FC, Prosper, araryama arenza umupira. Umupira uri gukinirwa mu kirere nta kipe ibasha kuwushyira hasi.

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Ruzindana Nsoro atangije umukino. Umupira wa mbere utewe na Muhoza Tresor wa Kirehe FC, atanga kuri mugenzi we Mohamed Abdallah, Donkor Prosper arenza umupira.

15:18

Ku kibuga hakubise haruzura

Mu gihe hari abafana bakinjira ahaherereye ikibuga. hano i Nyakarambi, ahubatswe amahema abiri ku bishyuye ibihumbi 5,000 n'ibihumbi 10 Frw hamaze kuzura ndetse n'abandi babuze aho bicara barahagarara. Ku ruhande, aho bahagarara, hishyuwe ibihumbi 3,000 Frw, naho abafana ni benshi ku buryo uyu mukino ari wo ushobora kuba witabiriwe cyane kuva iyi kipe ya Kirehe FC izamutse mu cyiciro cya mbere muri iyi myaka itatu.

14:54

Rayon Sports igera ku kibuga

14:51

Kirehe FC igera ku kibuga

14:51

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

Rayon Sports: Mazimpaka André, Iradukunda Eric Radu, Irambona Gisa Eric, Manzi Thierry (c), Habimana Hussein, Mutsinzi Ange, Donkor Prosper, Mugheni Fabrice, Manishimwe Djabel, Jules Ulimwengu na Michael Sarpong.

Umutoza: Robertinho

Kirehe FC: Musoni Theophile, Nkurikiye Jackson, Habimana Youssuf, Nzabonimpa Prosper, Cyuzuzo Ally, Habumuremyi Gilbert, Karim Patient, Masum Abdallah, Muhoza Trésor, Bugingo Samson, Kanani Abuba.

Umutoza: Sogonya Hamiss Kishi




Umusifuzi: Ruzindana Nsoro

14:40

Rayon Sports irasabwa kwitonda

Iki kibuga cya Kirehe gikunze kugora amakipe menshi by’umwihariko akomeye cyane. APR FC yahanganyirije ubusa ku busa, Mukura ihatsindirwa ibitego 2-1 mu gihe na Rayon Sports igomba kwibuka ko mu mwaka ushize w’imikino yahanganyirije igitego 1-1.

14:21

Rayon Sports yafashe Nyakarambi

Abafana b'ikipe ya Rayon Sports buzuye aka gace ka Nyakarambi. Mu muhanda aho umuntu ari guca ari kuza ku kibuga by'umwihariko hafi yacyo, huzuye abafana ba Rayon Sports. Abantu bose bambaye amabara y'ubururu mu buryo butandukanye.

14:17

Uko amakipe yombi yitwaye mu mikino itanu iheruka

14:10

Icyo umukino uvuze ku makipe yombi

Kirehe FC ya 14 n'amanota 27 inganya na Gicumbi FC, irasabwa gutsinda uyu mukino ndetse n'uwo izasorezaho shampiyona, yakirwa na Bugesera FC kugira ngo yizere kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere.

Rayon Sports ya mbere n'amanota 66, irasabwa gutsinda uyu mukino igahita yegukana igikombe cya cyenda cya shampiyona dore ko irusha APR FC ya kabiri amanota ane mu gihe hasigaye imikino ibiri ngo shampiyona igere ku musozo. Gikundiro izasoza shampiyona yakira Marines FC.

Ba rutahizamu ba Rayon Sports, Ulimwengu Jules na Michael Sarpong bamaze gutsinda ibitego 17 na 14, bategerejweho kubyongera.

14:07

Ikaze i Nyakarambi

Tubahaye ikaze mu karere ka Kirehe, ni mu burasirazuba bw'amajyepfo y'u Rwanda, hafi n'igihugu cya Tanzania. Ku kibuga cya Nyakarambi hagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa 29 wa shampiyona hagati ya Kirehe FC na Rayon Sports.

Kirehe FC iheruka gutsinda umukino wayo yakiniye i Nyagatare ku bitego 2-1 mu gihe Rayon Sports yo yatsinze Musanze FC ibitego 3-1.
